programme.title: Sinema Horor Asia - PANGGIL NAMAKU 3X
programme.desc: Sinema drama pilihan.

programme.title: Dilarang Masuk
programme.desc: Sekolah digegerkan dengan hilangnya Lisa, seorang murid baru yang pendiam. Adit yang merasa iba pada keluarga Lisa, mengajak lima temannya dalam sebuah misi untuk menemukan keberadaan gadis tersebut.

programme.title: AB Home Shopping
programme.desc: Menampilkan berbagai produk rumah tangga pilihan.

programme.title: Sinema Spesial - MAAFKAN AKU
programme.desc: Sinema drama pilihan.

programme.title: Inayah
programme.desc: Inayah terpaksa menikah dengan Doso, pria berumur dan telah memiliki tiga istri, karena orangtuanya terlilit hutang. Penderitaan Inayah dimulai, para istri tua Doso berusaha untuk menyingkirkannya.

programme.title: Senyum Iman
programme.desc: Pembawa acara menyajikan sederet kisah menarik dari berbagai komunitas Muslim di seluruh dunia.

programme.title: Rabbids Invasion
programme.desc: Kawanan makhluk kecil seperti kelinci dari planet lain tengah tengah menuju Bumi. Mereka sebenarnya hanya ingin bersenang-senang, tapi sayangnya kekacauan selalu terjadi di mana pun mereka berada.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo
programme.desc: Seorang superhero anak-anak dan mobil spesialnya, Super Speedo, yang dilengkapi dengan berbagai fitur inovatif, menjalani sederet petualangan seru untuk menyelamatkan dunia dari para penjahat.

programme.title: Drama Asia Pagi: APOLLO
programme.desc: Apollo, seorang agen yang sedang menyamar, memulai misi berbahaya untuk membongkar identitas dari sekelompok penjahat. Dalam penyelidikannya, ia menemukan sebuah rahasia tentang masa lalunya.

programme.title: Drama Asia Siang: Anjanee Dewi Ular
programme.desc: Anjanee, sang dewi ular, dijatuhi hukuman mati oleh kekasihnya sendiri, Pangeran Chaiyawong. Ia kemudian bersumpah untuk menunggunya bereinkarnasi demi menuntaskan dendamnya.

programme.title: Kasautii
programme.desc: Anurag dan Prerna kuliah di universitas yang sama, dan akhirnya menjalin hubungan erat. Namun, mereka harus menghadapi orang-orang yang ingin memisahkan keduanya, karena perbedaan status sosial.

programme.title: Bhagya Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi, wanita muda dari keluarga kelas menengah, hidup tenang di desanya. Namun, ia dipaksa untuk menikah dengan seorang dokter - hingga akhirnya menyadari pernikahannya ternyata jebakan belaka.

programme.title: Vish
programme.desc: Vishaili dan kekasihnya, Vishaila, adalah beberapa anggota terakhir yang masih hidup dari persilangan rahasia antara manusia dan ular. Mereka berjuang untuk menjalani hidup secara normal.

programme.title: Imlie
programme.desc: Imlie, gadis desa cantik dan pintar, terpaksa menikah dengan seorang jurnalis setelah mereka berlindung di sebuah gubuk saat hujan deras. Namun begitu tiba di kota, ternyata suaminya telah menikah.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Lucas playfully mimics Bodhi. But he may have offended her.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies
programme.desc: Stopping in the Jungle, Bop and Boo bound from the Bunny Bus, and make a beeline for a rock, covered in many butterflies! They flutter off to reveal the rock is really Kevin, a gentle CROCODILE kid. And he's crying, upset that his butterfly friends flew away. Bop and Boo want to help Kevin get them back, so he patiently shows them how to stay still and quiet as bunny-statues. After a few false starts, the butterflies finally return, and alight on all three kids! Bop and Boo are chuffed that they stayed so quiet and still. And, Kevin is delighted that his butterfly friends returned!

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Mumfie is making some of his famous tarts and Jelly Bean thinks they are so good that his friend could almost open a restaurant. Pinkey gets excited at the idea but Black Cat points out that playing at restaurants is not as easy as they might think.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Toff has sent Jovial’s bathtub flying off the Tangra-Hut, way into the distance! Worse still, it’s landed on one of the hills, buried beneath some heavy bubble-cubes!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: After Taz breaks all of his toys, Granny gives him one last chance to care for something.

programme.title: Esme & Roy
programme.desc: Fig wants to play Space Explorers with Hugo and Frank. But Hugo gets frustrated when Fig doesn’t play the right way. She blasts off before the countdown, she can’t fly, and she keeps playing with her bunny, which is not what Space Explorers do! Will they ever find a way to play together? Turns out, they can, when Esme suggests that Fig can still play Space Explorer while pretending to be a space bunny!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: When Granny gets sick, Lola tries to take over her responsibilities.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. It’s Tweety’s job to place the bones with his crane, but his fear of the big dino affects his ability to get the job done.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: The windmill isn't turning, which means Sunny Field Farm has no power. The windmill needs to turn again so Zee can launch his rocket! / Izzy and Timmy are making a bird caller for Grandma, but have trouble connecting pieces of their machine. The Mechas search for items that will move the machine along and help the kids call birds for grandma.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddler's helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels if they hope to figure out the villain's true scheme.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Berta is taking a picture with Big Old Boulder for the museum, but needs the Mechas help when the boulder rolls down the hill towards the museum! The Mechas need to work together to get the rock back up the hill, and keep it stable.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miff's tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide it's time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Esme & Roy
programme.desc: Esme and Roy are taking Tillie to the library to read “Pirate Furry-Beard and the Treasure Hunt.” There’s just one problem: it’s already checked out! The Monstersitters tell Tillie that there are lots of other books in the library to choose from, but they quickly realize that Tillie only wants to read “Pirate Furry-Beard.” Will Esme and Roy be able to convince Tillie to read another book?

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Every time the Tangrachuck-chucks try to enter their burrows, a powerful gust of air blasts them right back out!

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: When Lucas discovers a heating vent blowing warm air into the living room, he convinces Bodhi that the house is actually breathing.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels - but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Hero Celebration Day is finishing off with a slideshow of the everyday heroes of Pretty Big City, but the Mechas need to save the event when screen rips. The Mechas need to find something flat and opaque to properly show off the photos.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: When Granny gets sick, Lola tries to take over her responsibilities.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: MacBarm is bringing his chickens a new trough full of feed, that is until it falls out of his truck and breaks. The Mechas need to help him find a new container for the chicken feed, and fast, as the chickens are getting hungry. / Grandma and her twin sister return to Treetop Woods to recreate their old zipline act, but quickly discover that the zipline no longer exists!

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Russ grosses his friends out so much after licking all the picnic food that they all take off to eat elsewhere. Geo is the only one who stays behind. Now he must find a way to bring everyone back!

programme.title: Esme & Roy
programme.desc: Esme and Roy are playing with Sid and Lucy at the park. But when bugs start crawling on the scene, Sid starts to get nervous. The Monstersitters try moving locations and distracting Sid with games, but Sid is adamant – he does NOT like bugs. In the end, Esme and Roy set up a special Bug Safari. Now Sid can use binoculars to learn all kinds of bug facts… from a safe distance.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what it's like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one that’s smash-proof.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: It's the Pretty Big All City Read and Izzy and Barb are all set up, that is, until all the books end up missing on account of the yip yips. Now, the Mechas need to locate the books and get them all back to the library before the event starts.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: When Granny gets sick, Lola tries to take over her responsibilities.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads The Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. His crane breaks down and his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: When Berta was younger, she saw a mysterious creature roaming about Treetop Woods. / Gerry and Ranger Nat are leading the Treetop Troops on a hike, but when they get back to the truck, Ranger Nat is gone!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Chep's new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesn't know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: When Lucas is locked in a cuckoo clock, Findley must be brave enough to help!

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Finn and Jake are tasked with investigating reports of a haunting at Joshua and Margaret's old office.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven helps Sadie put together an act for Beachapalooza.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby offend some people.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: After being blasted by Duplikate, Blossom turns into a triple threat.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find an old book on traditional Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the gorgeous butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear. But to make the Lemmings bow to his authority, he will first have to become a true origami master.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom wins Employee of the Month at the Rainbow factory, Richard feels like he is never celebrated for all the work he does at home. Nicole is suspicious of how much he actually does, but when Richard goes on strike, his important role in keeping things under control becomes painfully clear...

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato, Pian, and Deep search Pian’s basement for a computer that can play an old Zilator 1 game disc that they found. What they find instead is Bitbobeep, a retro-looking robot who speaks with beeping sounds. Deep notices that Bitbobeep has a CD drive and inserts the Zilator 1 disc in the slot, but they are surprised when Amato and MechaBot are transported into the game world. The only way to bring them back is to beat the game. With the help of Deep’s expert video game knowledge, Deep and Pian manage to get Amato and MechaBot to the final level. There, Deep reveals a secret cheat code that lets the video game characters combine into Mechamato to defeat the final boss, and return to the real world.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: On a day out with just Chloe and Ice Bear, she realises that Ice Bear only runs errands for his brothers. Determined to show him a fun day in the city, Chloe promises to help Ice Bear have a good time, even if it means staying in a museum after it closes.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin forms a book club to debut his new autobiography, but the Titans would rather discuss other books.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard doesn't answer the door in time and the jobsworth delivery guy will not let him have his package. His options are to pick his package up at the depot or pay for a redelivery. Richard doesn't like the sound of either option, so a battle of wills begins that can only end in the destruction of one or both of them.

programme.title: We Baby Bears
programme.desc: Squatter Otter tries to win Panda’s trust and convince the Bears to live in a mysterious house.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: A bad robot named Shleep has been putting people around town to sleep. Amato tries to capture it but everything goes wrong when an alien named Chachix appears and takes control of Shleep. Under Chachix's control, Shleep takes on a savage wolf form which proves too strong for Amato. With the help of his friends, Amato has to figure out a way to outsmart the deadly enemy.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy helps Elmer relax at the pool. Sylvester keeps Porky up late. Bugs helps Yosemite Sam stage a knife throwing show.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: To retrieve his drone (which he thinks Hammy climbed onto by accident!), Mo requests from the Scepter the power to fly… And it works! But not the way he wants to: the half power has him drifting through the air like an helium balloon! Younes and Owen see what they think is an Alien, and launch an operation to capture him… Sam is handing out PDRA flyers when the half-power kicks in, which doesn’t make her job any easier… Sam and Stella have to find Mo and Lenny, and the boys have to get Hammy back before Sam realizes he’s missing…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy gets a stack of cash from the Tooth Fairy. So, against Raven's advice, the other Titans start knocking out their own teeth to get some of that sweet Tooth Fairy money.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice he's about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover they're travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and, in the process, allows them to finally go their separate ways.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato learns that a bad robot has escaped and taken control of the Mechanizer. With Pian’s ingenuity, the kids enter the digital Mechanizer world and are surprised to find that King Boxell has turned everything and everyone inside it into blocks. Now turned into blocks themselves, the kids have to stop King Boxell and take back the Mechanizer world.

There, Deep reveals a secret cheat code that lets the video game characters combine into Mechamato to defeat the final boss, and return to the real world.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs’ latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of ‘Duplicate’ Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates can’t be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: During a stressful trip to the mall, Robin finds peace in a massage chair.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin tries to teach the other Titans to have patience.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: The Ice King tries to win Princess Bubblegum over with his love potion.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven imagines what Garnet does with her day.

programme.title: Ben 10 Alien Force
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen learn that Max’s wife VERDONA is an alien and that Gwen’s magic is actually inherited alien power from their grandma. After learning the truth Gwen is forced to choose between keeping her life as she knows it and sacrificing all that she has to become a being of great power.

programme.title: Batman: The Brave And The Bold
programme.desc: Batman has his final battle with the balance-obsessed villain Equinox as the maniac tries to remake the universe in his own image.

programme.title: Batman: The Brave And The Bold
programme.desc: Batman and Black Canary are pitted against Music Meister, who is able to exert powerful mind control through song.

programme.title: Justice League Action
programme.desc: Batman and Blue Beetle have to travel back in time to stop Chronos from destroying a young Dark Knight on his very first case.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Hunson Abadeer returns to Ooo to bond with his daughter Marceline, but will he be able to prove that he's changed his soul-sucking ways?

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koo’s real identity?

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his father’s death…

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: The Pont D'Arc Murders
programme.desc: Two investigators with a painfully linked past are forced to team up to solve a mysterious murder which involves a carved stone dating back more than 40,000 years. They soon discover that the very thing that connects them might just solve the case.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: ASIA
programme.desc: Motherhood has not been easy for Asia, a single mother whose teenage daughter, Vika, barely interacts with her. But when Vika’s health deteriorates rapidly, Asia must step in and become the mother Vika so desperately needs.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: Risks And Side Effects
programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: Symphony Of The Office
programme.desc: Stuck in a monotonous job with an annoying boss, his colleague Bella is the only reason making Christopher stay. But when she is offered a job elsewhere, Christopher must come to terms with his feelings for her before she leaves.

programme.title: Bellbird
programme.desc: In this tender film on masculine grief and rural life, Ross is a small town dairy farmer who loses his spirit to live after the sudden death of his wife. As the seasons pass, he learns to connect with his own sense of loss and lean on those around him.

programme.title: A Summer in Tuscany
programme.desc: Laura, a journalist, travels to Italy to investigate illegal fashion labour practices and find out more about a family secret. She is soon courted by the charming lawyer Alessandro, but eventually realizes that he isn’t all that he proclaims to be.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: The Pont D'Arc Murders
programme.desc: Two investigators with a painfully linked past are forced to team up to solve a mysterious murder which involves a carved stone dating back more than 40,000 years. They soon discover that the very thing that connects them might just solve the case.

programme.title: The Night Guard
programme.desc: Salvador, a security guard working the night shift in Mexico City, attempts to leave his workplace to attend an important engagement elsewhere. When questioned by police about a case, he tells a white lie that soon escalates into dramatic consequences.

programme.title: Zurich
programme.desc: Nina roams the highways of Europe in a desperate attempt to forget her past. She decides to join a German driver on his journey, but it becomes clear that Nina’s behaviour stems from her pain due to a past betrayal.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite foul-mouthed teddy bear is back for a second round of hilarious antics and outrageous adventures.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: When his very first assignment goes awry, an ex-elite soldier finds himself hunted, caught in a deadly conspiracy and fights to stay alive to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Last Looks
programme.desc: A disgraced former LAPD detective is roped back into working as a private eye to investigate the murder of an eccentric television star’s wife.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A clerk with no future finds his world tossed upside down after he joins a secret group of assassins when he discovers he has special powers.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Matt Damon reprises his most iconic role in the latest chapter of the Bourne franchise.

programme.title: Moonfall
programme.desc: The moon is hurtling towards Earth on a collision course. Three unlikely heroes mount an impossible last-ditch mission into space to stop the disaster only to find out that our moon is not what we think it is.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A robot boy had been programmed to love, but was proved to be so much more.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A clerk with no future finds his world tossed upside down after he joins a secret group of assassins when he discovers he has special powers.

programme.title: Einstein And Eddington
programme.desc: A story about the unlikely partnership during World War I between a young British scientist named Arthur Eddington and the brilliant physicist, Albert Einstein.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: A glib man finds out that he has only 1000 words left to speak before he dies.

programme.title: El Diablo
programme.desc: A mild-mannered schoolteacher vows to rescue a kidnapped girl from the deadly outlaw El Diablo.

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Freddy Heflin idolises the police, but his slight deafness excluded him from joining the force. Now he is Sheriff of a town home to many NYPD cops, but all is not well in cop land.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, a man struggles to pay for a heart and must go on the run before it is repossessed.

programme.title: Fortress
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent and his son are besieged in a high-tech bunker by a group of criminals. Are its steel walls and advanced weapons enough to stop them?

programme.title: Sanctum
programme.desc: Tim penyelam gua bawah air mengalami krisis yang mengancam jiwa selama ekspedisi ke sistem gua yang belum dijelajahi dan paling sulit diakses di dunia.

programme.title: Crayon Shin Chan (Repeat)
programme.desc: Seorang anak berusia lima tahun bernama Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara beserta orang tua, adik bayinya, anjing, tetangga, dan teman-temannya dan berlatar di Kasukabe, Prefektur Saitama.

programme.title: Crayon Shin Chan (Repeat)
programme.desc: Seorang anak berusia lima tahun bernama Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara beserta orang tua, adik bayinya, anjing, tetangga, dan teman-temannya dan berlatar di Kasukabe, Prefektur Saitama.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess (Repeat)
programme.desc: Permainan kekuatan yang intens antara bangsawan karena mereka semua berjuang untuk kerajaan yang lebih baik untuk semua orang.

programme.title: The Legend Of Condor Heroes (Repeat)
programme.desc: Dua pemuda Dinasti Song yang berdedikasi, Yang Tie Xin dan Guo Xiao Tian mengetahui bahwa istri mereka sedang hamil. Mereka berjanji satu sama lain bahwa ketika anak-anak mereka lahir, mereka akan menjadi saudara angkat atau saudara perempuan (jika keduanya berjenis kelamin sama) atau menikah jika berbeda jenis kelamin.

programme.title: Ghostquake
programme.desc: Sebuah sekolah swasta New England dikunjungi oleh kepala sekolah yang sudah mati.

programme.title: Hours
programme.desc: Saat Badai Katrina melanda, seorang ayah muda (Paul Walker) harus mengambil tindakan ekstrem untuk melindungi bayinya yang baru lahir di rumah sakit yang dievakuasi dan gelap.

programme.title: After The Dark
programme.desc: Di sebuah sekolah internasional di Jakarta, seorang guru filsafat menantang kelasnya yang terdiri dari dua puluh lulusan senior untuk memilih sepuluh dari mereka yang akan berlindung di bawah tanah dan menghidupkan kembali umat manusia jika terjadi kiamat nuklir.

programme.title: Crayon Shin Chan (Repeat)
programme.desc: Seorang anak berusia lima tahun bernama Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara beserta orang tua, adik bayinya, anjing, tetangga, dan teman-temannya dan berlatar di Kasukabe, Prefektur Saitama.

programme.desc: Seorang anak berusia lima tahun bernama Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara beserta orang tua, adik bayinya, anjing, tetangga, dan teman-temannya dan berlatar di Kasukabe, Prefektur Saitama.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess (Repeat)
programme.desc: Permainan kekuatan yang intens antara bangsawan karena mereka semua berjuang untuk kerajaan yang lebih baik untuk semua orang.

programme.title: The Legend Of Condor Heroes (Repeat)
programme.desc: Permainan kekuatan yang intens antara bangsawan karena mereka semua berjuang untuk kerajaan yang lebih baik untuk semua orang.

programme.title: Dead Rush
programme.desc: Kehidupan David terbalik ketika penyakit yang tidak diketahui menyulut epidemi zombie besar-besaran, membuat orang yang selamat hanya memiliki sedikit tempat untuk bersembunyi. David bergegas pulang untuk melindungi istrinya yang sedang hamil, sambil mengumpulkan orang-orang yang selamat.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo
programme.desc: Seorang pria mengandalkan keterampilan gladiator yang baru diperolehnya untuk menyelamatkan mantan pacarnya dari penculik.

programme.title: Sanctum
programme.desc: Tim penyelam gua bawah air mengalami krisis yang mengancam jiwa selama ekspedisi ke sistem gua yang belum dijelajahi dan paling sulit diakses di dunia.

programme.title: Gank Your Heart (Rerun)
programme.desc: Kisah cinta antara live streamer mengubah seorang komentator olahraga dan seorang gamer esports. Ji Xiang Kong adalah seorang gamer terkenal yang terkenal karena ketampanan dan pesonanya.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess (Rerun)
programme.desc: Permainan kekuatan yang intens antara bangsawan karena mereka semua berjuang untuk kerajaan yang lebih baik untuk semua orang.

programme.title: The Legend Of Condor Heroes (Rerun)
programme.desc: Permainan kekuatan yang intens antara bangsawan karena mereka semua berjuang untuk kerajaan yang lebih baik untuk semua orang.

programme.title: Masih Adakah Cinta Kita
programme.desc: Film ini mengisahkan tentang keluarga kecil Gilang, Bunga dan seorang anak bernama Mentari. Gilang mempunyai sifat playboy yang istrinya juga memakluminya. Namun suatu ketika Bunga menderita kanker payudara. Gilang bertemu dengan Cindy yang memiliki tempat khusus di hatinya. Saat Bunga akhirnya sembuh dari penyakitnya, Gilang pun mulai menghindari Cindy. Namun penyakit Bunga kembali lagi dan mereka hanya menerima kenyataan yang ada.

programme.title: Mars (Mimpi Ananda Raih Semesta)
programme.desc: Tupon, wanita tua di kaki Gunung Kidul, tanpa kenal lelah membesarkan Sekar Palupi untuk terus sekolah. Sang ibu yang buta huruf yang selalu membawa Sekar Palupi melihat alam semesta, Tupon selalu menunjukan lintang lantip (bintang yang cerdas), planet Mars. Ia selalu bilang bahwa Sekar bisa ke sana dengan ilmu pengetahuan. Sekar mampu meraih gelar master dalam bidang astronomi di Oxford Univeristy, Inggris.

programme.title: The Perfect Husband
programme.desc: Ayla, siswi SMA kelas 3, sedang menikmati masa remajanya dan asmara dengan Ando, sang vokalis band rock. Ia sangat terkejut ketika seorang pilot muda bernama Arsen, yang mengaku sebagai suaminya.

programme.desc: Pertemuan Kendra dengan Maudy berawal dari pertemuan tak sengaja di Villa disitulah pertama kali Ken melihat Maudy dan langsung jatuh cinta. awalnya Maudy terganggu dengan kehadiran Ken, tanga sengaja kuda ditumpangi Maudy ngamuk hingga terperosok ke sungai tak lama Ken loncat selamatkan Maudy.

programme.title: Anak Sekolahan
programme.desc: Cinta yang diperankan oleh Natasha Wilona merupakan gadis desa yang datang ke Jakarta untuk menyusul ibu dan adik tirinya tanpa disangka setelah datang ke Jakarta, ibu dan adik tirinya tidak mau menganggap Cinta, atas bujukan sang ibu Cinta memutuskan kembali ke kampungnya sayangnya di perjalanan pulang Cinta ditipu orang dan nasib pun mempertemukan Cinta dengan Bintang

programme.title: Udah Go Public Tapi Masih Shy Shy Cat
programme.desc: Adit dan Raya mau dijodohkan karena disuruh oleh Omanya Adit, Awalnya mereka cuma berpura-pura kalau menyetujui perjodohan, lama kelamaan kok jadi timbul rasa suka beneran

programme.title: Cinta di Lain Waktu - Catatan Harianku
programme.desc: Hubungan Zefa dengan RENDI, pacarnya, jadi merenggang. Zefa kepikiran, apa mungkin Rendi menjauhinya karena ia jatuh miskin dan penampilannya berubah? melihat Rendy Bersama seorang perempuan. Tapi Rendy malah pura pura tidak mengenalnya, bahkan kabur dan hampir menyerempet Zefa hingga terjatuh. Untung dia ditolong oby yang naik sepeda dan membawanya. Zefa kaget saat tahu ternyata Oby adalah sahabat kecilnya waktu SD dan dia tak mengenalinya.

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Kedua Kali - Catatan Harianku
programme.desc: Berprofesi sebagai guru, Dinda pernah dikecewakan oleh mantan pacarnya bersikap kasar, Dinda memutuskan untuk tidak berpacaran. Namun semua berubah ketika ia bertemu dengan teman SMAnya dahulu bernama Bagas, yang tak lain adalah orang tua dari Nina, murid kesayanganya di sekolah. Sempat cekcok saat SMA, justrui keduanya makin dekat karena kehadiran Nina. Keduanya pun akhirnya punya hubungan spsial setelah lama mengenal.

programme.title: Love Story The Series
programme.desc: Pertemuan Kendra dengan Maudy berawal dari pertemuan tak sengaja di Villa disitulah pertama kali Ken melihat Maudy dan langsung jatuh cinta. awalnya Maudy terganggu dengan kehadiran Ken, tanga sengaja kuda ditumpangi Maudy ngamuk hingga terperosok ke sungai tak lama Ken loncat selamatkan Maudy.

programme.title: Anak Sekolahan
programme.desc: Cinta yang diperankan oleh Natasha Wilona merupakan gadis desa yang datang ke Jakarta untuk menyusul ibu dan adik tirinya tanpa disangka setelah datang ke Jakarta, ibu dan adik tirinya tidak mau menganggap Cinta, atas bujukan sang ibu Cinta memutuskan kembali ke kampungnya sayangnya di perjalanan pulang Cinta ditipu orang dan nasib pun mempertemukan Cinta dengan Bintang

programme.title: Proyek Cinta Punya Mazzeh Bikin Meleleh
programme.desc: Kerjaan Clara jadi sekertaris Roman, Clara bertahan karena harus biayain adik nya sekolah, tapi akhirnya mereka jadi jatuh cinta beneran

programme.title: Love Story The Series
programme.desc: Pertemuan Kendra dengan Maudy berawal dari pertemuan tak sengaja di Villa disitulah pertama kali Ken melihat Maudy dan langsung jatuh cinta. awalnya Maudy terganggu dengan kehadiran Ken, tanga sengaja kuda ditumpangi Maudy ngamuk hingga terperosok ke sungai tak lama Ken loncat selamatkan Maudy.

programme.title: Habis Married Godaan Datang, Semoga Kuat Yagesyah
programme.desc: Rachel mengira perjalanan rumah tangga semulus di dongeng, ternyata banyak godaan yang mengganggu rumah tangga Rachel dan Nathan sehingga berantem dan salahpaham terus, tetapi mereka bisa gak yahh melawan godaan tersebut?

programme.title: Love Story The Series
programme.desc: Pertemuan Kendra dengan Maudy berawal dari pertemuan tak sengaja di Villa disitulah pertama kali Ken melihat Maudy dan langsung jatuh cinta. awalnya Maudy terganggu dengan kehadiran Ken, tanga sengaja kuda ditumpangi Maudy ngamuk hingga terperosok ke sungai tak lama Ken loncat selamatkan Maudy.

programme.title: Cinta yang Tulus - Catatan Harianku
programme.desc: Cinta (Rachquel Nesia) yang sedang galau, menyusul Bik Inah ke kampung halamannya. Cinta pun kaget saat kembali bertemu dengan Tulus (Ben Joshua). Lantaran pertemuan pertama mereka membuatnya saling berdebat. Saksikan selengkapnya hanya di Catatan Harianku!

programme.title: Anak Sekolahan
programme.desc: Cinta yang diperankan oleh Natasha Wilona merupakan gadis desa yang datang ke Jakarta untuk menyusul ibu dan adik tirinya tanpa disangka setelah datang ke Jakarta, ibu dan adik tirinya tidak mau menganggap Cinta, atas bujukan sang ibu Cinta memutuskan kembali ke kampungnya sayangnya di perjalanan pulang Cinta ditipu orang dan nasib pun mempertemukan Cinta dengan Bintang

programme.title: Mau Heran Tapi Dia Mantan
programme.desc: Heran banget sih, udah jadi mantan tapi kenapa masih kepikiran? Tiara dan Putra sebenarnya saling mencintai tetapi dipisahkan oleh saudara tirinya putra yang juga suka sama Tiara padahal itu bukan cinta tapi obsesi, bisa ga ya Tiara dan Putra bersatu kembali?

programme.title: BALI: PARADISE ON EARTH
programme.desc: A semi-documentary exploring Bali Island, the beautiful and exotic paradise on earth

programme.title: Abang Cupang Mendadak Sayang
programme.desc: Berawal dari pelarian Anita (Shanice Margaretha) yang tak mau dijodohkan sama pilihan orangtuanya membuat Anita bertemu dengan Afton (Andrew Andika). Awalnya mereka berseteru tapi gara-gara Afton punya kartunya Anita, lantas ia bisa memanfaatkan Anita untuk bantu jualan ikan cupangnya. Dari jualan cupang itu akhirnya mereka saling kenal satu suka satu sama lain.

programme.title: D'KOPLO
programme.desc: D'Koplo… Genre Terbaru Dilahirkan Indosiar! Setelah Sukses Dengan Berbagai Talent Search, Indosiar Membuat Terobosan Baru Dengan Menggabungkan Antara Talent Search Dan Variety Show. Memberi Kesempatan Setiap Orang Yang Berani Menunjukkan Bakat Sambil Bernyanyi Koplo Baik Solo, Duo, Trio Dan Band. Penuh Keseruan Dan Keceriaan Dengan Penampilan Semua Dibawa Bahagia Dan Tergila-Gila

programme.title: PERNIKAHANKU SEPERTI RACUN YANG PERLAHAN TAPI PASTI MEMBUNUHKU
programme.desc: Ajeng harus menerima kenyataan betapa beratnya menjadi istri dari Henry. Henry suka gonta-ganti istri kedua dan jika ia sudah bosan dengan istri keduanya maka akan langsung ditalak. Awalnya Ajeng sakit hati dan selalu menangis, namun kini sepertinya Ajeng telah lupa bagaimana rasanya menangis.

programme.title: Keluarga Somat
programme.desc: Keluarga kebersamaan khusus Somat memberi tahu kita bahwa kita harus hidup berdampingan dan saling membantu sebagai komunitas dan sebagai siswa.

programme.title: Princess Jalanan Kebal Ditembak Cinta
programme.desc: Jingga dan Anggun kakak adik yang sama-sama menyukai Wira, tetapi perasaan Anggun harus kandas dan merelakan Jingga adiknya dengan Wira.

programme.title: HOT SHOT
programme.desc: Hot Shot adalah program infotainment yang menyajikan berita tentang selebriti Indonesia. Disajikan dengan sangat baik sehingga menyajikan berbagai berita selebriti yang merupakan yang terpanas, terpanas, dan yang pasti adalah bahwa pemirsa akan menerima informasi dan berita tentang seniman idola mereka.

programme.title: Kepoin Lida ZOZO
programme.desc: Liga Dangdut Indonesia (LIDA 2020) selalu berhasil memberikan kejutan menarik yang dapat membuat penonton terhibur. Salah satunya adalah melalui segmen berjudul Kepoin Lida Zozo. Kepoin Lida Zozo adalah program buku harian Lida yang disajikan oleh Jirayut sebagai Mister Kepo

programme.title: Cowok Cool Bikin Klepek Klepek
programme.desc: Reno udah ganteng, cool, pinter bikin kopi yang enak lagi, cewek mana coba yang gak klepek-klepek sama dia? Yaa cuma Nadya doang yang ga tertarik. Kira-kira kenapa ya?

programme.title: PERJUANGAN ORANG KECIL YANG INGIN MEMBERI MANFAAT BESAR BAGI BANYAK ORANG
programme.desc: Dengan muka yang sudah tidak cantik lagi, (Icha Annisa) tetap berusaha dan semangat menawarkan produk skincare yang ia jual. Tetapi dengan kondisinya setelah mengalami kecelakaan, (Icha Annisa) tidak putus asa. Bahkan ia juga menciptakan produk skincare sendiri untuk memberikan manfaat bagi pengguna produknya tersebut.

programme.title: PERNIKAHANKU DIUSIK MUSUH DALAM SELIMUT
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Dina dan Yuda menjadi berantakan karena orang ketiga. Awalnya Dina mengira Novi yang ingin merebut Yuda dari dirinya, tapi semua salah. Ternyata tak disangka ternyata Rika seorang yang bekerja di rumah Yuda yang sangat berambisi menjadi istri. Bahkan Rika tega mencelakai Dina dan menculik bayinya.

programme.title: 3 Semprul Mengejar Surga 5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan tiga pemuda semprul yang berjuang untuk kebaikan, namun mengalami berbagai rintangan.

programme.title: Tuhan Beri Kami Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang Ustadz Faiz (Dude Harlino) yang diminta oleh temannya membantu Keluarga Pak Rasman (Adipura) untuk mendalami ajaran Agama Islam. Pak Rasman memiliki pengalaman pahit karena tidak bisa berdoa untuk membimbing Almarhum ayahnya ketika saat sakaratul maut.

programme.title: Sejadah
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan info tentang kesehatan bukan hanya dari segi medis saja tetapi juga akan dikupas secara islami. Saksikan episode lengkap Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) bersama pakar kesehatan dr. Cahyono, Sp. Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed di Vidio.

programme.title: Para Pencari Tuhan Jilid 1
programme.desc: Perjuangan Bang Jack untuk mempertahankan masjid yang telah didirikannya. Suatu hari, peristiwa yang tidak pernah diduga sebelumnya terjadi, Bahrudin datang menggugat Pak Jalal dengan dokumen-dokumen yang lengkap bahwa tanah yang sekarang menjadi mihrab masjid adalah miliknya karena merupakan warisan dari keluarga leluhur.

programme.title: Berkah Cinta
programme.desc: Berkah Cinta merupakan drama keluarga tentang perjodohan oleh orang tua yang merupakan sahabat lama. Sinetron dengan setting kehidupan perkotaan menceritakan Tania Amalia dijodohkan oleh ayahnya Haris dengan anak dari sahabat karibnya Lukman yang bernama Eros. Perjodohan ini ditentang oleh kakak Tania, Vano.

programme.title: 3 Semprul Mengejar Surga 5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan tiga pemuda semprul yang berjuang untuk kebaikan, namun mengalami berbagai rintangan.

programme.title: Pesantren Rock N Roll
programme.desc: Wahyu Subuh adalah pemuda yang berasal dari keluarga berada di Jakarta. Ayah Wahyu, Ibrahim Sani, seorang direktur di perusahaan negara yang sangat sibuk. Sementara ibu Wahyu yang bernama Rosminah, berprofesi sebagai ibu rumah tangga yang hidup dalam kesibukan sebagai seorang istri pejabat.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Surviving Jeffrey Epstein (S1)
programme.desc: More survivors untangle the complex and insidious sex trafficking scheme that ensnared them as trusting young women pursuing their dreams, including never before told stories.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers (S1)
programme.desc: When James Barry breaks up with his girlfriend Melanie Eam in 2016, she retaliates by cruelly snatching his life away.

programme.title: Cellmate Secrets
programme.desc: Shayna Huber's college friend and the cousin of her victim, Ryan Poston, reveals how Shayna manipulated Ryan in order to lure him back into her arms before murdering him in cold blood.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2)
programme.desc: In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's murder. Investigators suspect a serial killer, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: This articulate and boastful killer is remembered for terrifying the coastal town of Santa Cruz in the early 1970s, but his desire to kill started when he was a young child fantasising about murder.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A fight between teenagers turns deadly when an 18-year-old is killed by a single gunshot. Eyewitnesses claim a 16-year-old student pulled the trigger, but the young student insists he is innocent.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life Or Parole (S2)
programme.desc: Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a woman's death. Now 65, he believes he has demonstrated his rehabilitation.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special “Follow the Clues” surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring – Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia

programme.title: Olivia

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here!
programme.desc: Archibald and Sage enter an endurance race through the corn maze to end all corn mazes. / Thinking his new sneakers have made him super-fast, Archibald gets roped into delivering ice cream for a couple of new-to-town entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever!
programme.desc: Audrey’s obsession with fun gets her too wrapped up in the Bloogey Boys’ LARPing game. The Harvey Girls and Bloogey Boys battle over who’s the rightful owner of a cool couch.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.desc: Major Weems comes to the 4077th, and at first his concern for his wounded black soldiers seems genuine; on further examination it becomes apparent that the Major is in fact highly prejudiced, to the point of trying to eliminate blacks from his unit by transferring them or assigning them to the front lines. programme.desc: Menceritakan hidup seorang anak yang harus menempuh perjalanan jauh dari rumah ke sekolah karena di desa kecil tempat ia tinggal, tidak ada angkutan umum. Banyak pelajaran hidup yang dapat kita ambil dari kisahnya.

programme.desc: Bergabunglah bersama Jabrik, Momon, Putri Elmo dan Tantan bersama mengenal bentuk huruf dan angka, menari, melukis serta bernyanyi bersama. Mari kita Belajar, dan Bermain bersama di Jalan Sesama milik kita.

programme.title: Sesame Street - Season 47

programme.title: Pintar
programme.desc: Pintar adalah program anak dengan target usia pre-school. Anak-anak diajak untuk belajar dan melatih kemampuan berpikir dan mengenali apa yang ada disekitar, baik dalam bentuk ataupun warna.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Season 13

programme.title: Pororo - Season 6
programme.desc: Pororo penguin kecil dan teman-temannya tinggal di tanah damai yang tertutup salju dan es. Mereka semua memiliki kepribadian yang berbeda dan minat yang berbeda, yang kadang-kadang menyebabkan sedikit kejadian di dunia musim dingin yang tenang. Tetapi bersama-sama, setiap hari adalah petualangan di mana mereka belajar tentang semua pelajaran hidup, baik besar maupun kecil!

programme.desc: Di kota besar di mana berbagai kendaraan hidup bahagia bersama, bus kecil kami Tayo baru saja mulai mempelajari rutenya di kota. Ada banyak lagi yang harus dipelajari untuk Tayo. programme.desc: Berita Terkini Seputar Ekonomi, Bisnis, Investasi, Bursa Saham, Market, Finansial, Perbankan & Entrepreneur Di Indonesia Serta Dunia.

programme.title: Drop Out
programme.desc: Jemi yang hampir di DO oleh kampusnya, merasa mendapatkan sebuah keajaiban saat seorang dosen muda, Lea, datang dan mengajar. Simbiosis mutualisme diantara keduanya pun terjadi. Lea memberikan pelajaran intensif dan sebagai balasannya, Jemi memberikan pengetahuan tentang masalah asmara kepada Lea.

programme.title: Nada-Nada Rindu
programme.desc: Ramlan merasa kalah bersaing dengan Rhoma Irama. Ia berusaha merusak hubungan Rhoma Irama dengan kekasihnya, Mia. Rhoma difinah berselingkuh dengan Maya, kekasih Ramlan.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak 3
programme.desc: Film ini merupakan kelajutan film sebelumnya, kisah dimulai ketika Kang Sono digantikan oleh Gerry sebagai makelar kawin kontrak. Dalam film ini terdapat 3 orang bernama Ceppy, Itol dan Dani. Petulangan cinta mereka dimulai ketika mereka diperkenalkan Gerry oleh juragan Janda Herang pembisnis kawin kontrak.

programme.title: Ricky Nakalnya Anak Muda
programme.desc: Ricky sangat terpukul dengan kematian pacarnya, Sita saat terjun payung. la jadi kacau, kerjanya cuma jalan-jalan dengan jip tua terbuka, kumpul-kumpul dengan gengnya, dan berkelahi.

programme.title: Dua Garis Biru
programme.desc: Kisah cinta pasangan remaja SMA yang penuh rintangan berujung lara saat kehamilan yang tak direncanakan mendatangkan konsekuensi menyakitkan bagi keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Ratu Kostmopolitan
programme.desc: Tiga cewek cantik dan bokek mau tidak mau harus jumpalitan, putar otak, dan baca mantra buat mengusir preman yang mau menggusur rumah kost mereka. Sambil rebutan cowok, pula!

programme.title: Marina
programme.desc: Anton SH, pengacara muda, dihinggapi rasa ketakutan akan penyakit gila yang menghinggapi ayah dan kakeknya. Karena itu dia takut kawin. Ketika akhirnya ia kawin dengan Marina, dia minta agar istrinya tidak hamil. Perjalanan keluarga ini bertambah ruwet dengan kenyataan sukses karier Marina sebagai penyanyi dan belum berhasilnya Anton sebagai pengacara. Kesulitan memuncak ketika Marina hamil.

programme.title: Bila Hati Perempuan Menjerit
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Indahsari yang selalu menjadi ratu batik tiga tahun berturut-turut tidak tahu bahwa masalah menghampirinya saat ia berkenalan dengan Boy. Saking tergila-gilanya akan Indah, Boy yang selalu berusaha mendekati Indah yang sudah akan menikah, nekat memperkosa Indah. Saat dinyatakan tidak bersalah, Indah melakukan main hakim sendiri, karena ternyata Boy juga memperkosa adiknya, Astri.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: 1997. SOLEH SOLIHUN berhasil masuk Universitas Padjadjaran. Namun kondisi kampus yang gersang dan lokasinya yang jauh dari mana-mana, membuat Soleh jadi meragukan pilihannya.

programme.title: R-Raja, Ratu & Rahasia
programme.desc: Seorang siswi yang berduka atas kematian orang tuanya bergabung dengan klub ekskul dan menjalin kisah asmara dengan teman sekelasnya yang menyimpan sejumlah rahasia.

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Beda
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang sepasang kekasih yang berbeda keyakinan Diana dan Cahyo. Namun saat mereka mulai mencoba melanjutkan ke jenjang yang lebih serius, orang tua mereka sangat bertentangan dengan rencana ini. Hingga dilema mereka memuncak saat Diana dijodohkan oleh Oka pria pilihan ibunya.

programme.title: Kirun+Adul Pengen Punya Pacar Keren
programme.desc: Anak perempuan Wakil Presiden diculik. Kirun dan Adul disinyalir jadi penjahatnya.

programme.title: Romeo+Rinjani
programme.desc: Siap menikahi pacarnya setelah menyelesaikan sebuah tugas di Gunung Rinjani, seorang fotografer lepas bertemu dengan orang baru yang periang seperti dirinya.

programme.title: Darah Perawan Bulan Madu
programme.desc: Putra yang baru menikahi Amira berencana mengajak sang istri untuk berbulan madu di pulau pribadinya. Namun keanehan-keanehan mulai terjadi menghantui pasangan pengantin baru tersebut.

programme.title: Bwf

programme.title: Descendants of the Sun
programme.desc: "Healing Romance set in beautiful Southern Country's nature. Believing in love, not in miracle, they try to make a miracle from their love. Here goes the story of the heroes in our mind."Every dream is bought for a fortune and some say that happiness is followed by success. Those who compromised only to succeed are extolled and those who fought against for justice are ridiculed for being reckless. The world is in which nobody is ashamed of saying "Greed is good." That's why we need a hero.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: Urban Cops Season 1
programme.desc: This is a reality show featuring four celebrities as rookie detectives joining the investigation with real-life police at the Criminal Intelligence Unit in Seoul. programme.desc: The new season brings twenty two Thai superstars into a merciless boxing competition, with a special first ever Thai female match showcasing women’s incredible spirit! programme.title: Run Puppy Run
programme.desc: In this variety show, dog-loving celebrities team up with their dogs for the biggest dog agility competition in Korea. The teams show the communication, achievement and emotional bonds between humans and dogs through the process of learning and preparing for the sports challenges.

programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One).
