programme.desc: It's the first elimination and all contestants besides Julie are in it. It’ll be over two rounds and they will be competing in their Fans vs Favourites teams!

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: It's a choice between a hollowed out house abandoned mid-flip by another investor, or a mid-century gut job with a potential money-making opportunity for their next buyer: a rentable living space.

programme.title: Lies Between Friends
programme.desc: A wealthy family's life is turned upside down when the 18-year-old daughter of a family friend comes to live with them for a few months.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: When a good deal appears, the team decide it could be worth it if they can work fast and limit their loan interest to a single one-month payment. It becomes a 30-day race to complete the job.

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: It's a choice between a hollowed out house abandoned mid-flip by another investor, or a mid-century gut job with a potential money-making opportunity for their next buyer: a rentable living space.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: After building what they thought was their dream home, Felicia and Jerelde's house no longer suits their needs. With a thriving meal prep business and limited space, Felicia is ready to find a new home.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: When Chante and Matt bought a house in Farragut, Tennessee they thought they were buying their dream home. But six years and eight adopted kids later, the home they once considered large is now too small.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Rodney and Amber bought their home in Michigan after falling in love with its country setting, but for Rodney, Amber, and their son Kal, their home is feeling pretty crammed with just the three of them.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Ten years ago, when Jenifer and Josiah bought their home in Detroit, they paid only $16,500 cash. But when Josiah's man cave was ruined by a flood, he couldn't face renovating and is considering moving.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: The team senses a golden opportunity when they check out a zombie house and discover a hidden treasure in the backyard - a buried pool. If it can be restored, it could boost their sale price.

programme.title: 24 Hour Flip (S1)
programme.desc: Michelle and Jon travel outside of their comfort zone - and area code - to tackle a new challenge in the small lakeside community of West Milford.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S14)
programme.desc: This season’s first Mystery Box, and the ingredients are exactly the same as those that were in the very first Mystery Box challenge back in season one.

programme.title: Next Door Nightmare
programme.desc: When young couple Sarah and Kyle move next door to Helen, a charismatic older woman, they have no idea she's a deeply disturbed psychopath who will stop at nothing to become Sarah's surrogate mother.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S14)
programme.desc: This season’s first Mystery Box, and the ingredients are exactly the same as those that were in the very first Mystery Box challenge back in season one.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1
programme.desc: In the hot, and humid tropical forests of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission. She needs to find a mate, find food and lay her eggs, all before the monsoon arrives in 5 months time. She’s not the only one, for lots of animals in the jungle, this is breeding season, where males vie for the attention of females in the hope of finding a mate. Will they all get what they want and secure the next generation before the rains set in?

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tim’s squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1
programme.desc: The Arabian Peninsula is the world’s transit hub for three billion birds on migration to and from Europe, Africa and Asia. This episode tells the stories of the majestic raptors and magnificent waders, from the largest migrants to the smaller residents, and how they fly, hunt and survive in this region of extremes - both in the wild desert and close to the urban jungle.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1
programme.desc: In the forests of southern India, the relentless heat of the summer brings challenges for Asian elephants, who need to drink every day. As the water starts to disappear around her, a wise old matriarch called Anura decides it’s time to lead her family on the yearly migration to ensure their survival. Her journey is made all the more important as there’s a new addition to the herd - her 3-month-old grandson Navin. This may also be one of her last chances to ensure she passes on all her knowledge, gained over a lifetime, to the younger members of her family.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2
programme.desc: Chilema is an Elephant with half a trunk; losing the tip to a poacher's snare. It was intended to catch antelope for bushmeat. But the snare's indiscriminate nature means other animals often fall foul of them, with devastating results. Chilema is now having to adapt to life without an elephants most important appendage. She must learn how to eat, drink and also take a mud bath to ensure her survival. With the added challenge of the harsh dry season, Chilema is fighting against the odds to survive.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2
programme.desc: Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrake’s dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1
programme.desc: The Arabian Peninsula is the world’s transit hub for three billion birds on migration to and from Europe, Africa and Asia. This episode tells the stories of the majestic raptors and magnificent waders, from the largest migrants to the smaller residents, and how they fly, hunt and survive in this region of extremes - both in the wild desert and close to the urban jungle.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2
programme.desc: Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrake’s dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1
programme.desc: Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses !

programme.title: Fitness class
programme.desc: Today we meet for a 30-minute session to strengthen our back and reduce our aches and pains. The expert Anette Alvaredo shows us effective Pilate exercises. The purpose is to improve support and strengthen our back muscles gently, to make our backs more flexible, to reduce muscle tension. Our back will work intensely but with smooth exercises to avoid injuries.

programme.title: Fitness
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our fitness courses !

programme.title: Stretching
programme.desc: Stretching

programme.title: Fresh Yoga
programme.desc: The accumulation of our past, our experiences, the pressure of our culture, covers our pure hearts with beliefs which generate fear, ignorance and bad choices, far removed from our individual essence. This session inspired by the purity of nature of the islands, the clarity of the water, will give us the opportunity to observe our interior, to explore our whole body as much as our subtle body, by opening our shoulder and pelvic girdles, and by freeing our joints … Fluid movements will be waiting for you.

programme.title: My Zen Trendy
programme.desc: Just Float, this is the latest yoga trend and mantra for an relaxed mind. As you enter a fully soundproof studio and float in vats filled with epson salts, you will disconnect from the urban buzz. That is Val’s promise as she takes us to experience this funny trend. With a sain mind comes a sain body: it’s time to head to Clover Juice, the most famous juice address in Los Angeles. As we make our way through Clover’s kitchen, we discover this way of life, mix and learn more on these beverage’s benefits.

programme.title: Of Houses and ideas
programme.desc: Our design tour starts in Nantes, where we discover Julie and her family’s colourful apartment, done in a vintage décor. Next up, we’ll head to the heart of Paris, where Mildred welcomes us to her contemporary and refined duplex. Finally, it’s off to Mathilde’s family farm in the South-West, which she renovated by marrying her passion for design with her love of old stone. And of course there’ll be the shopping section at the end of each visit to get you fully inspired.

programme.title: Through your eyes
programme.desc: The historical monuments of Paris have been a heritage shaped since immemorial times by craftsmen who have gathered to create a guild called "Compagnons du Devoir". From the Middle Age to the 19th century, they were everywhere in the architecture and construction of the capital. For example, few people know that the Eiffel Tower was built by the Companions. In the Marais, their work is everywhere. Being a "Compagnon du Devoir " means to be like any other craftsman except for a few differences: one has to live in community for a while and create a masterpiece. It is an unique approach to excellence.

programme.title: Explore TV
programme.desc: Join Trevor & Nigel for spectacular wildlife viewing sessions, as they go in search of the famed Grizzly Bear, exploring the wilderness from a secluded floating lodge in the heart of Great Bear Rain Forest, British Columbia.

programme.title: Luana's Kitchen
programme.desc: A birthday without a cake? Impossible! It’s a day to enjoy so we make several cakes to delight young and old. To make this day a memorable moment, Luana Belmondo has concocted 3 recipes for birthday cakes with surprising & sweet flavors, a carrot cake, chocolate creams, and Bombolini, these are small Italian donuts made from pizza dough & lined.

programme.title: Spa Seekers
programme.desc: Lindsay and Jaymee visit the Sila Everson Hideaway resort, which was modeled after a peaceful Thai fishing village and Kamalaya, a spa resort built around a Buddhist cave. Which one of these spas will the sisters choose as the best spa resort in Koh Samui?

programme.title: My Day Dubai
programme.desc: In this episode, our presenter Gabriela will visit Sustainable City in Dubai. She will discover how the residents garden, how they dress in sustainable clothes and, of course, how they eat by preparing healthy recipes. She will end her day with a Qigong class with a Qigong master.

programme.title: Babette's Kitchen
programme.desc: Basmati rice, red or Camargue rice, brown rice, brown rice, black rice, white rice…, in addition to the many existing varieties, rice is also the most consumed product in the world. Indeed, it is the staple food of 50% of the world's population. It must be said that the benefits of this cereal are no longer to be proven. In addition to being invigorating, it is also, among other things, a good source of energy and a food of choice for anyone with gluten intolerance.

programme.title: Parisian Style
programme.desc: We’re at Bénédicte’s house today, just a few kilometres outside of Paris, in the small town of Triel-sur-Seine. She and her four children live here surrounded by lush countryside. Before that we’ll drop in on Laetitia and her husband and the vibrant home they share with their four children in the 6th arrondissement. But let’s start by visiting the very romantic Florence Boles, who lives in a duplex in Paris.

programme.title: Through your eyes
programme.desc: In the heart of Cambodia lies the Tonle Sap, the largest lake in Asia and the most populated. Countless floating villages move according to the seasons and the whims of the weather. Sophie is welcomed into a house on a raft that raises crocodiles, a common practice on the Tonle Sap. She also learns to weave fresh water hyacinths, a plant pest that nevertheless provided a livelihood for some families on the lake. As early as the 9th century, the vast Khmer empire had succeeded in taming the fluctuations of the lake and rainwater by setting up an extraordinary network of canals and basins, which, a thousand years later, still allows Cambodians to face droughts.

programme.title: Explore TV
programme.desc: In this episode, Trevor heads to Northern Bali, to introduce to the viewers areas of Bali less known. We visit a pearl farm and learn how the beautiful pearls are made and how a real pearl farm operates…and even a taste of pearl meat. Trevor relaxes on the quiet beaches, admire the beautiful scenery…and a dive at the stunning Menjagan Island. Trevor also visits the Komodo dragons on the Komodo Island, and learns more about this magnificent animal and where he lives.

programme.title: Deco Masters
programme.desc: It's off to another week of competition. As every Monday, the four contestants have a meeting in the workshop in Brussels before they go head to head on their own building sites. It's an opportunity to test the mettle of their opponents, and the first to claim the title of ace decorator is Davide. At 39, he owns a gîte which he is currently redecorating, so he's not short of practice.

programme.title: Earth from above
programme.desc: In this instalment, Yann Arthus-Bertrand lifts the veil on the products people buy. Almost everything we buy has a direct impact on our environment. We head to Japan to talk about the impact of new technologies, then to the Republic of Congo in Bukavu for the coltan harvest. How does our total consumption affect the environment? What permanent brands are we imposing on our planet? How can we differentiate between useful and useless purchases?

programme.title: Fresh Yoga
programme.desc: Supreme happiness does not come from having it or from outer success but from the embodiment of our inner being. This inner being then gives us access to futile pleasure, pleasant experience, the very consequence of the embodiment of inner happiness. Our philosophy reveals aspirations, desires, while letting go of superficial needs. The return to our essence allows us to become aware of what we really need and not to waste time with what is inessential to us. This session gives us the opportunity to anchor ourselves in the essence, by feeling our balance and reactivating it. Perched in the trees, Katy was inspired by the force of the simplicity of Nature to create standing postures, revealing our potential, then giving us the strength to achieve our dreams and achieve what we really want.

programme.title: Fitness class
programme.desc: In a pleasant landscape, this workout combines intense exercises to work abs, thighs and buttocks. This session will help you tone your body, burn fat and get back in shape! To burn your fat, we will perform super effective cardio exercises that stimulate areas such as the abdomen, legs and buttocks while having fun!

programme.title: Stretching
programme.desc: Stretching

programme.title: Yoga for kids
programme.desc: Today I'm going to teach you how to do the hedgehog, a fun balancing act to massage your whole back.

programme.title: Yoga for kids
programme.desc: Today I'm going to teach you how to do the butterfly. A fun exercise that helps you concentrate.

programme.title: Yoga for kids
programme.desc: Today, I'm going to invite you to do the little piggy exercise to have fun while you massage your back. Grouik grouik!

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Practice Yoga from the comfort of your home with our experienced teatchers.

It's an opportunity to test the mettle of their opponents, and the first to claim the title of ace decorator is Davide. At 39, he owns a gîte which he is currently redecorating, so he's not short of practice.

programme.title: Through your eyes
programme.desc: In the heart of the city of Angkor, the great historical capital of Cambodia, Sophie will realize how the glorious Khmer past is still in minds and in the city. Sophie will make a stroll through the superb 12th century temples, more or less buried in the jungle, or mingled with the workers of an archaeological site. She will truly perceive this close connection that the Khmers have with the spirit of their ancestors.

programme.title: Luana's Kitchen
programme.desc: If salt is used daily for cooking, salt crust cooking is not often practiced. However, this technique has many advantages, it is easy to perform, and this method of stewing allows you to concentrate all the flavors and bring softness to the ingredients. So the dishes will be smoother! In this episode, Luana cooks with chef Babette de Rozières. In a good mood, they are going to cook a duck with a salt crust and crunchy potatoes, and a pineapple in a salt crust with spicy syrup. They will give you all their tips for an even tastier and more fragrant cuisine.

programme.title: French version
programme.desc: Flavors of blackberry, undergrowth, leather and many others are bottled in the heart of the capital. The Paris distillery will explain the secret recipes of their subtle spirits. Then we will meet the artistic director Jérôme Faillant Dumas who makes the luxury brands becoming crazy with his pronounced taste for beautiful things. We will take a peaceful stroll on the Seine. If you can't swim in it, you can still sail it! To finish, we will meet the Pastry Chef Cédric Grolet, who plays with forms and flavors for creations as bluffing as delicious.

programme.title: Spa Seekers
programme.desc: The Aleenta resort is located in private Natai beach. Its “home away from home” concept makes one feel at ease. Jaymee and Lindsay decide to get unique treatments with exotic ingredients like coffee and tamarind. The next resort is Racha, a boat ride away since it sits on its own island. The highlight of their stay is the suite which is built on a lighthouse.

programme.title: Explore TV
programme.desc: Trevor and Chrissy travel to South Korea to have a holiday that leaves you feeling better, healthier and fitter. Wellness Tourism in Korea has been actively promoted worldwide for years, and now emerging as a major tourism theme today. The duo begins their journey in Seoul, where they visit traditional Korean spa and green tea therapy and Chrissy even visits a famous Korean cosmetics house. In their wellness trip through Korea, they also travel to the famous city of Jeonju.

programme.title: Massages
programme.desc: Massage studio will show you the best massage techniques in places which will make you dream. Let us take care of you! Lay down, relax and forget all your problems.

programme.desc: Practice Yoga from the comfort of your home with our experienced teatchers.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats, pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd. 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: Life after school: Stay or Go?
programme.desc: We met with a group of international students to hear about their experiences and plans in Japan. Do they see a future for themselves here? Or are they planning to go back abroad? Let's find it!

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Pakistani Habib ur Rahman who creates power wheelchairs in Kobayashi City, Miyazaki, as well as Chinese Xia Siya who works in children's education support in Yubari City, Hokkaido.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make kuzu-mochi, a Nara Prefecture specialty. This refreshing treat is perfect for summer.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: A Culture Built with Wood Hida
programme.desc: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills, such as kigumi or wood joinery.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Russia's invasion of Ukraine has caused widespread damage, including destroyed houses, schools, and hospitals. Structural engineer Miyamoto Hideki is working with local people to repair buildings.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about risshu and shosho, two dates of early autumn. The temple chefs show us how to prepare dishes using winter melon and share their recipe for a Japanese-style ratatouille.

programme.title: Life after school: Stay or Go?
programme.desc: We met with a group of international students to hear about their experiences and plans in Japan. Do they see a future for themselves here? Or are they planning to go back abroad? Let's find it!

programme.title: Learn Japanese from the News
programme.desc: In August, a shrine in Okayama Prefecture held an event showcasing the quenching process of a roughly 80cm Japanese sword. The sword will be dedicated to the shrine's deity in December.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: 44 I've heard he's giving another recital. / To tell someone what you heard from someone else, use adjectives or verbs without "masu" or "desu," then add "soo desu."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Samurai Castles" from "Time & Tide", which shows Japanese castles as attainments of Samurai wisdom. We present two episodes of Hikone Castle and Matsumoto Castle.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Honma Mareki is part of an international project involving 200+ scientists that claims to have photographed a black hole, both in 2019 and 2022. Can a black hole truly be seen? Prof. Honma explains.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: The Piercing Gaze
programme.desc: A man strikes a pose in an iconic woodblock print by the artist Sharaku. Who is the mysterious figure... and what is he doing? And why did the artist want to commemorate the moment?

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: Some remote Japanese villages are turning to a nuisance-animal expert for help in controlling wild animals that destroy their fields. They're transforming a problem into a community asset.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Dogu.

programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.desc: The World Health Organization says around 1 billion people could have avoided vision impairment or blindness by seeing an eye doctor. We look at how artificial intelligence is saving people's vision.

programme.title: Pendekar Langit Dan Bumi
programme.desc: Drama Cina ini menceritakan tentang Zhong Kui muda bersama dengan teman-temannya untuk membentuk tim tiga orang yang didedikasikan untuk menangkap setan. Serial ini juga menceritakan pertumbuhan dan transformasi Zhong Kui dalam menjalani tugas menjaga dunia manusia dari setan, serta lika-liku cinta dan benci dengan Bai Ning Yu yang melintasi alam dan menembus ke dunia abadi. Cerita dalam drama ini akan dibagi menjadi enam kisah, masing-masing kisah terinspirasi dari cerita rakyat Cina.

programme.title: Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Csi: Catatan Seputar Investigasi
programme.desc: Sebuah program buletin crime news, menyoroti berbagai tindak kriminalitas yang terjadi di tanah air serta memberikan tips-tips untuk menghindari kejahatan

programme.title: Terang Kasih
programme.desc: Siraman rohani Kristen yang berkaitan dengan kehidupan untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Tuhan Yesus Kristus. Program ini akan dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian, antara lain kesaksian, renungan, serta konseling yang akan dipandu oleh dua orang host

programme.title: Gajah Mada
programme.desc: Pasangan Lailan Manggrani dan Jawangkati memiliki anak bernama Gajah Mada yang lahir saat guntur dan kilat, menandakan bahwa Ia akan tumbuh menjadi orang yang hebat. Jawangkati adalah seorang pendekar sakti dan pemimpin para prajurit Majapahit, Ia ingin anaknya mengikuti jejaknya dan menjadi pemimpin. Namun, Ia tewas di medan perang yang menyebabkan Majapahit diambil alih oleh prajurti Tar-tar dari China. Jawangkati meninggalkan senjata ampuh untuk anaknya, yaitu Gada Ruja Pala. Setelah kehilangan suaminya, Lailan tidak ingin anaknya menjadi prajurit dan melarangnya mempelajari bela diri. Namun, Gajah Mada diam-diam belajar dari Eyang Wungkuk Hanuraga. Gajah Mada menggunakan kekuatannya untuk membela rakyat, mempertahankan kebenaran dan yang lemah.

programme.title: Gajah Mada
programme.desc: Pasangan Lailan Manggrani dan Jawangkati memiliki anak bernama Gajah Mada yang lahir saat guntur dan kilat, menandakan bahwa Ia akan tumbuh menjadi orang yang hebat. Gajah Mada menggunakan kekuatannya untuk membela rakyat, mempertahankan kebenaran dan yang lemah.

programme.title: Ustadz On The Road
programme.desc: Program religi yang dipandu oleh seorang host dan Ustadz yang akan memberikan kajian islami dengan treatment on the road disertai dengan study kasus. Pembahasan dilakukan sepanjang perjalanan menuju lokasi sesuai agenda harian Ustadz. Program ini akan disajikan secara ringan dan menyenangkan.

programme.title: Lensa Indonesia Pagi
programme.desc: Program berita yang menghadirkan informasi terkini, rangkuman peristiwa yang terjadi dari malam hingga dini hari dengan dua segmen khusus, yaitu Lensa Dunia dan Lensa Arena yang membahas berbagai informasi olahraga di Indonesia maupun mancanegara

programme.title: Jungle Agent
programme.desc: Petualangan para agent di hutan untuk menyelesaikan berbagai permasalahan yang timbul. Dengan menggunakan petunjuk yang seadanya mereka terkadang menyelesaikan pelbagai masalah yang ada.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Di musim baru, Super Pet, hewan pendamping Super Wings, akan muncul. Super Wings yang ada akan memiliki Super Pets dan menjalankan misi bersama. Selain itu, karakter pesawat transformasi baru yang di bernama Golden Boy. Golden Boy, yang memiliki rasa kecemburuan dan persaingan yang kuat, bukanlah anggota Super Wings, tetapi karakter yang mengganggu Super Wings dalam menjalankan misi atau menganggu pekerjaan.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Kisah timmy sepupu dari shaun the sheep si domba kecil. Dia berumur 3 tahun ( dalam satuan tahun domba ) dan menjadi satu - satunya anak domba di kumpulannya. Timmy terbiasa untuk melakukan segala sesuatu dengan caranya sendiri. Dan sekarang untuk pertama kalinya ia harus belajar untuk mengerjakan segala sesuatu bersama-sama yang lain.

programme.title: Pj Mask
programme.desc: Petualangan tiga sahabat Amaya, Connor dan Greg yang selama siang hari mengerjakan pekerjaan sekolah dan tugas tugasnya dan dimalam hari menjaid superhero dengan kekuatan mereka untuk mengalahkan para penjahat yang membuat kekacauan seperti mencuri benda bersejarah dan lain lain

programme.title: 911 Go! Go!
programme.desc: Program magazine yang memberikan berbagai macam informasi terkait kehidupan hewan jalanan termasuk menampilkan proses penyelamatan hewan tersebut mulai dari evakuasi, rehabilitasi, hingga penyerahan ke shelter penampungan ataupun proses adopsi. Program dikemas secara ringan dan menghibur serta diharapkan dapat membangun rasa empati serta simpati pemirsa terhadap hewan.

programme.title: Lensa Indonesia Siang
programme.desc: Program berita yang menghadirkan informasi terkini, dengan dua segmen khusus, yaitu Lensa Dunia dan Lensa Arena yang membahas berbagai informasi olahraga di Indonesia maupun mancanegara

programme.title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures
programme.desc: BARBIE DREAMHOUSE ADVENTURES ini menceritakan keseharian dan petualangan menarik Barbie Roberts bersama sahabat dan keluarganya, khususnya bersama adik-adik perempuannya yang seru.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Di musim baru, Super Pet, hewan pendamping Super Wings, akan muncul. Super Wings yang ada akan memiliki Super Pets dan menjalankan misi bersama. Selain itu, karakter pesawat transformasi baru yang di bernama Golden Boy. Golden Boy, yang memiliki rasa kecemburuan dan persaingan yang kuat, bukanlah anggota Super Wings, tetapi karakter yang mengganggu Super Wings dalam menjalankan misi atau menganggu pekerjaan.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz
programme.desc: Mateo, Izzie, dan teman-teman mereka tersandung ke Dunia Impian, dunia sihir dan fantasi tempat mereka harus menggunakan kreativitas mereka untuk melawan kekuatan gelap.

programme.title: Kamen Rider Ghost
programme.desc: Sebuah program live action dengan tokoh utama Takeru Tenkuji, seorang pemburu hantu dengan modal "Ghost Icon" atau mata hantu dari ayahnya yang sudah meninggal, dia memburu hantu kesana kemari. Takeru Tenkuji meninggal karena dibunuh oleh monster bernama ganma yang memburu Ghost Icon. Namun, Ia bangkit dengan Ghost Icon (Ore Tamashi) pemberian ayahnya dan berubah menjadi Kamen Rider Ghost.

programme.title: Smurf
programme.desc: Di tengah hutan belantara, terdapat desa rahasia dihuni oleh sekelompok makhluk kecil berwarna biru yang dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf. Para Smurf tinggal di rumah berbentuk jamur dan hidup dengan damai. Ada beberapa karakter smurf lain nya seperti Wild Smurf yang memiliki sifat yang nakal dan memiliki hubungan yang kuat dengan kehidupan hewan, juga temperamen tetapi dia memiliki cara yang aneh terhadap rutinitas harian Smurf berbeda dengan para Smurf lainnya. Karakter lainnya yaitu Leaf, seorang peri alam yang ditakdirkan untuk menggantikan Mother Nature (pada musim pertama) yang belum memiliki kendali penuh atas kekuatannya.

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang mengisahkan Boboiboy dan teman-temannya yakni Gopal, Ying, dan Yaya yang masing-masing memiliki kekuatan super. Dengan kekuatan yang dimiliki mereka mencegah Adu Du mencuri biji kakao Tok Aba yang digunakan sebagai sumber energi. Selain itu, Boboiboy dan teman-temannya menjadi pahlawan super dalam menumpas kejahatan dan menjaga kedamaian Bumi.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit, Adelya, Dennis, Mitha, Devi, Bang Sopo & Bang Jarwo, serta masih banyak lagi

programme.title: Stb (Sangat Tidak Biasa)
programme.desc: Program ini menghadirkan kompilasi informasi berbagai macam issue dan topik yang akan dibahas dari berbagai sisi dan dipaparkan oleh penyulih suara

programme.title: Pendekar Langit Dan Bumi
programme.desc: Drama Cina ini menceritakan tentang Zhong Kui muda bersama dengan teman-temannya untuk membentuk tim tiga orang yang didedikasikan untuk menangkap setan. Serial ini juga menceritakan pertumbuhan dan transformasi Zhong Kui dalam menjalani tugas menjaga dunia manusia dari setan, serta lika-liku cinta dan benci dengan Bai Ning Yu yang melintasi alam dan menembus ke dunia abadi. Cerita dalam drama ini akan dibagi menjadi enam kisah, masing-masing kisah terinspirasi dari cerita rakyat Cina.

programme.title: Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Britain In Color
programme.desc: Travel the world via colourized footage and attend famous events that reshaped the British Empire in the early 1900s. See rare scenes from royal tours, the South African Boer War, and Gandhi’s peaceful protests in independence-seeking India.

programme.title: Britain In Color
programme.desc: Dig deep into the history and character of Britain’s greatest wartime hero, Winston Churchill. Peek at rarely seen, colourized home movies and watch newsreel footage of the epic highs and lows of the masterful politician’s distinguished career.

programme.title: Impossible Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the incredible animals living in one of the world’s toughest places, deserts. With ground temperatures exceeding 70 degrees Celsius, to survive here creatures have developed some ingenious adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals
programme.desc: Patrick Ayree introduces us to the Rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the world’s most remarkable behaviours and adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the amazing animals that live in the most dynamic landscape on earth – the Coast. From crashing waves, to extreme tides, surviving here takes ingenuity and incredible adaptations.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: America's Hidden Stories
programme.desc: In 1864, papers found on the body of Union Colonel Ulric Dahlgren ordered the assassination of Confederate President Jefferson Davis. Historians are now uncovering the plot—and questioning whether Lincoln’s assassination a year later was retaliation.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs get trained to be sniffer dogs, protection dogs and search and rescue dogs in Austria. In the USA, dogs help to locate people trapped on the mountain and dogs who help guard the farms from wolves and coyotes.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.desc: Two young individuals, Angad and Sahiba, can barely stand one another. However, their lives end up intertwining because of a marriage.
